title: The Ghost Out of Time
description: In the fourth novel in this bestselling seriesl, Raven is given an assignment by the demon Lilith. She meets a time traveling ghost, is betrayed by her lover and best friend, visits Merlin's cave, is harrassed by vampires, has narrow escapes from death, and falls in love. It's all in a day's work for a psychic investigator. And that's just the first few chapters.
author: Joe Vadalma
